name: pWebArc
description: Personal Private Passive Web Archive is a suite of tools to collect, save, mirror, manage archives of (i.e. hoard), and view web pages and whole websites offline.
author: Jan Malakhovski

toggle-tabconfig-tracking.description: For the current tab, toggle tracking and reset it for the tab's new children

toggle-tabconfig-children-tracking.description: For current tab's new children, toggle tracking

toggle-tabconfig-limbo.description: For the current tab, toggle limbo mode and reset it for the tab's new children

toggle-tabconfig-children-limbo.description: For current tab's new children, toggle limbo mode

show-tab-state.description: For the current tab, show the internal state and the log of recently collected and discarded reqres

collect-all-tab-inlimbo.description: For the current tab, collect all reqres in limbo

discard-all-tab-inlimbo.description: For the current tab, discard all reqres in limbo
